alternativeNames: Möller, Alfred; Moeller, Friedrich Alfred Gustav Jobst
comments: Published as Alfred Moeller. Collected in Brazil.
examples: Jatropha aipi (Pohl) A. Moeller, Phycomyc. & Ascomyc.: 92 (1901).
source: CMI. Ber. Deutsch. Bot. Ges., 41: (75)-(83) (1923 publ. 1924). Martius, Fl. Bras., 1(1): 64-65 (1906).
